sn45.30:4.2: Then Venerable Uttiya went up to the Buddha …
sn45.30:4.4: “Just now, sir, as I was in private solitude this thought came to mind.
sn45.30:4.5: ‘The Buddha has spoken of the five kinds of sensual stimulation.
sn45.30:4.8: I have spoken of these five kinds of sensual stimulation.
sn45.30:4.10: Sights cognizable by the eye that are likeable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing. Sounds cognizable by the ear …
sn45.30:4.13: Touches cognizable by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
sn45.30:4.14: These are the five kinds of sensual stimulation that I’ve spoken of.
sn45.30:4.15: The noble eightfold path should be developed to give up these five kinds of sensual stimulation.
sn45.30:4.16: What is the noble eightfold path?
sn45.30:4.18: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.30:4.20: The noble eightfold path should be developed to give up these five kinds of sensual stimulation.”
